email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a shipment of 12,000MT of wheat from Vancouver to Yokohama under CIF terms. The vessel STAR MARINER is available for this route. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT.

Please let me know if you need further details or if you would like to proceed.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what are the laycan dates and the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The STAR MARINER has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is from 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-05. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Let me know if this works for you or if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for the details. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider revising the freight quote to USD 43.00 per MT?

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Considering the current market conditions, we can revise the freight quote to USD 43.50 per MT. I hope this meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

The revised rate is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment - Vancouver to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-05. We will also ensure that all necessary documentation is prepared.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas
